text: Applegate may refer to: == Places == * Applegate, California, United States * Applegate, Michigan, United States * Applegate, Oregon, United States * The Applegate River in Oregon ** Applegate Lake, on the Applegate River ** Applegate Valley, along the Applegate River ** Applegate Valley AVA, an American Viticultural Area * Applegate Trail, a pioneer trail through the Oregon Territory * Applegate language, a language in the Athabaskan group * Applegate tribe, a Native American people == Other uses == * Applegate (surname) == See also == * * * Apple (disambiguation) * Gate (disambiguation)
title: Applegate
